snippet: Having more hybrid and electric vehicles on the road will help reduce greenhouse gas emissions.
abstract: Editorial welcomes fact that American consumers are increasingly buying fuel-efficient hybrid and electric vehicles; notes that industry still has a long way to go, but maintains that success of electric and hybrid cars shows that timely regulation, targeted assistance and government-private sector cooperation can pay big dividends for industry and the environment.
lead_paragraph: Having more hybrid and electric vehicles on the road will help reduce greenhouse gas emissions.
